title: Hun a danglam rorelna ni ropui
lyrics:
Hun a danglam rorelna ni ropui,
Ni tin ka hnaih zel thin;
Thlemna leh lungngaih buainate,
Ka doral chu a lo lian e.

Aw, malin min awmtir suh,
Ka hnenah awm zel la;
Zion tlang mawi ka thlen hma chuan,
Ka Chhandamtu, min hruai zel rawh.

Ka hmaah thlemna tuipui a lo lian,
Boral ka hlau Lalpa;
Chu luipuia pil tawhte chuan,
Chatuan ram an thleng tawh lo vang.

Nova dam laia thil awm zia angin
Leh Sodom khua angin,
Mahni nawmsakna ngaihtuahin,
Aw Lalpa, an hawisan ta che.

I lehkhabu thianghlima ziak angin,
Khawvel hi a buai ta;
Hmangaihna a dai zo ta,
Buaina leh lungngaihna a khat.

Khawvel hrehawmna leh lungngaihna hian,
Pa hmel min hmuhtir la;
Zion fate kan zale
nna
Ni ropui chu a hnai ta e.
